name.japanese: ナインエボルブースト

description.sun-moon:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets
energy from its evolved friends and boosts its
stats sharply.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets
energy from its evolved friends and boosts its
stats sharply.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets
energy from its evolved friends and boosts its
stats sharply.
description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages each.
effect.shortEffect: Raises all of the user's stats by two stages.
